name: docker-build-platform
description: High-performance Docker build platform with distributed caching

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n api,builder,cache,web,analytics "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:builder" "npm run dev:cache" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:analytics"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:api && npm run build:builder && npm run build:cache && npm run build:web && npm run build:cli
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:builder && npm run test:cache && npm run test:cli && npm run test:integration
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test && npm run test:integration
scripts.install:services: cd services/control-plane && npm install && cd ../builder && npm install && cd ../cache && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../analytics && npm install && cd ../../cli && npm install
